Articles.Content:
Hello Everybody!

I have been working on creating a new Contract Pack that looks at the Historical Progression of human's journey into space. @Whitecat106 has created an amazing pack of more than 500 historical missions that is the inspiration of this. For me, I love the historical aspect of his missions, but it becomes too tedious to launch the same mission 10 times. I understand that this is how the real world worked, but I want to play the most important missions in human history without having to progress through 10 Explorer missions first. The pack that @Whitecat106 has created is amazing with the amount of time that he put into it. I hope to be able to be even partially as detailed as he is!

This is the list that I have come up with. The list below is organized by date that the mission was launched, and it will work in a progression. Many of the missions have prerequisites of completing the previous mission, but some have prerequisites of just accepting a mission. Many of the missions will branch off to be able to run a couple at the same time, but will eventually come back into the same branch to keep things in order.

Please take a look at the list and let me know if there are any achievements or notable missions that I have missed.

  1. Sounding Rocket    First Launches
  2. V-2    First Suborbital Flight
  3. R-7    First ICBM
  4. Sputnik    First Satellite
  5. Sputnik 2    First Object with Living Creatures to Orbit
  6. Explorer 1    First American Satellite
  7. Vanguard 1    First Solar Powered Satellite, Oldest Object still in Earth Orbit
  8. Luna 1    First Flyby of Moon
  9. Explorer 6    First Photo of Earth from Orbit
  10. Luna 2    First Impact into Moon
  11. Luna 3    First Images of Farside of Moon
  12. Discoverer 13    First Object to Orbit and Return something to Earth
  13. Mercury-Redstone 2    First Primate in Space
  14. Venera 1    First Flyby of Venus
  15. Koarbl-Sputnik 5    First Mammals to Orbit and Return to Earth
  16. Vostok 1    First Human to Orbit Earth
  17. Freedom 7    First Suborbital Human Flight
  18. Vostok 2    1 Day Spent in Space
  19. OSO-1    First Solar Observatory
  20. Mariner 2    First Succesful Venus Flyby (science data returned)
  21. Vostok 6    First Woman in Space
  22. X-15 Flight 90    First Fixed Flight Aircraft in Space to Land Safely
  23. Voskhod 1    3 Humans in One Capsule
  24. Mariner 4    First Flyby of Mars, First Pictures of Mars
  25. Voskhod 2    First EVA
  26. Gemini V    7 Days in Space
  27. Venera 3    First Impact into Venus
  28. Gemini VII    First Orbital Rendezvous
  29. Gemini VI    First Orbital Rendezvous
  30. Luna 9    First Soft Landing on Moon, First Images from Surface of Moon
  31. Gemini VIII    First Orbital Docking
  32. Luna 10    First Satellite Around Moon
  33. Venera 4    First Probe to Send Data from Venus Atmosphere
  34. Apollo IV    First Test of Saturn V
  35. Zond 5    First to Orbit Moon and Return to Earth
  36. OAO-2    First Ultraviolet Telescope
  37. Apollo VIII    First Humans to Orbit Moon
  38. Mariner 7    First Images of Phobos
  39. Apollo XI    First Landing on Moon
  40. Apollo XII    Second Landing on Moon
  41. Apollo XIII    First Free Return Trajectory around Moon
  42. Soyuz 9    14 Days in Space
  43. Venera 7    First Soft Landing on Venus
  44. Luna 16    First Automated Sample Return from Moon
  45. Lunokhod 1    First Rover on Moon
  46. Apollo XIV    Third Landing on Moon
  47. Salyut 1    First Space Station
  48. Mars 2    First Impact into Mars
  49. Mars-3    First Soft Landing on Mars
  50. Mariner-9    First Orbit of Mars
  51. Apollo XV    Fourth Landing on Moon, First Rover
  52. Pioneer 10    First Ship on Escape Trajectory from Sun, Pass Asteroid Belt, Jupiter Flyby
  53. Apollo XVI    Fifth Landing on Moon, 3 Days on Moon
  54. Apollo XVII    Final Landing on Moon
  55. Pioneer 11    First Saturn Flyby
  56. Skylab 1    First American Space Station
  57. Skylab 2    28 Days in Space
  58. Skylab 3    56 Days in Space
  59. Mariner 10    First Photos of Venus, First Mercury Flyby
  60. Skylab 4    84 Days in Space
  61. Venera 9    First Orbit of Venus, First Images from Surface of Venus
  62. Apollo-Soyuz    First International Joint Mission
  63. Viking 1    First Images from Mars Surface, First Soil Samples of Mars
  64. Helios 2    Closest Ever Flyby of Sun
  65. Voyager 2    First Uranus Flyby, First Neptune Flyby
  66. Voyager 1    Flyby of Jupiter, Flyby of 5 Jupiter Moons, Flyby of Saturn, First in Interstellar Space
  67. Pioneer 12    First Multi-Year Mission at Venus
  68. STS-1    First Reusable Manned Spacecraft
  69. Venera 13    First Venus Soil Samples, First Sounds from Venus Surface
  70. STS-5    4 Crew Members
  71. IRAS    First Infrared Orbital Observatory
  72. STS-7    5 Crew Members
  73. STS-9    6 Crew Members
  74. STS-41B    First Untethered EVA
  75. STS-41C    First Satellite Repair
  76. STS-41G    7 Crew Members
  77. Mir    First Long-Term Space Station
  78. Soyuz TM-4    365 Days in Space
  79. Phobos 2    First Flyby of Phobos
  80. Magellan    First to Map Venus
  81. Hipparcos    First Astrometric Observatory
  82. Galileo    First Asteroid Flyby, First Orbit of Jupiter, First Probe in Jupiter Atmosphere
  83. COBE    First Orbital Cosmic Microwave Observatory
  84. Hubble    First Optical Observatory
  85. STS-61    Repair Hubble
  86. NEAR Shoemaker    First Orbit of Asteroid, First Landing on Asteroid
  87. Pathfinder    First Rover on Mars
  88. HALCA    First Orbital Radio Observatory
  89. Cassini-Huygens    First Orbit of Saturn, First Landing on Titan
  90. ISS-Zarya    First Multinational Space Station
  91. ISS-Unity    Building the ISS
  92. Stardust    First Sample Return from Comet Trail
  93. ISS-Zvezda    Building the ISS
  94. ISS-3A    Building the ISS
  95. ISS-Expedition 1    First Crew on ISS
  96. Dennis Tito    First Tourist in Space
  97. Genesis    First Vessal Return from beyond Moon
  98. Hayabusa    First Ascent from Asteroid, First Sample Return from Asteroid Surface
  99. SpaceShipOne    First Private Ship in Space
  100. MESSENGER    First Orbit Mercury
  101. New Horizons    First Flyby Pluto
  102. Dawn    First Orbit of Giant Asteroid
  103. Kepler    First Telescope to Search for Planets
  104. Dragon    First Private Ship to Orbit
  105. Juno    First Polar Orbit of Jupiter
